The codeblocks-20.03- Wiki setup-nonadmin.exe file is provided for convenience to users that do not have administrator rights on their remges machine(s), Donations NOTE: The codeblocks-20.03mingw-setup.exe file includes additionally the GCC/G#+/GFortran compiler and GDB debugger from MinGW-W64 project (version 8.1.0, 32/64 bit, SEH). NOTE: The codeblocks-20.03(mingw)-nosetup.zip files are provided for convenience to users that are - m‘ allergic against installers. However, it will not allow to select plugins / features to install (it includes D~ SOEpEIE everything) and not create any menu shortcuts.
